content.question: Michelangelo can be interpreted as responding to the work on the left through his

choices.label: even more exaggerated use of contrapposto
decision to depict the subject poised at the moment before decisive action
overt rejection of the bronze medium as too antiquating

content.answer: decision to depict the subject poised at the moment before decisive action

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.2: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Explain how two or more works of art are similar and/or different in how they convey meaning.
